title: Swoogo?s Kit PvP World
briefDescription: This is a Medium size kit pvp map that was used on the popular Swoogo's Kit PvP Realm. This is the fourth map used on ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a Medium size kit pvp map that was used on the popular Swoogo?s Kit PvP Realm. This is the fourth map used on his realm and it is now free to use by anyone else.
Feel free to play with your friends and use on your own realm only if you credit Swoogo!

title: Frozen Flat (Map Template)
briefDescription: Hi this is my second map, this map contains the creation of an igloo village and a huge snowy world which can be used to ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hi this is my second map, this map contains the creation of an igloo village and a huge snowy world which can be used to build your creations on empty land. I call the world ?Frozen Flat?
If you don?t like my igloo village you can move to plain unused land. Moreover, this world size is less than 1MB, interested?
Well you will appear in the middle of my village, there are igloos, pine trees and potato fields. You can also use this world as your map template but please give credit if it is published. the main purpose of this map is as a template for other maps, for example you can build castles, and the biomes on this map are frozen taiga
This is the picture:

The Kitchen, and the Restroom. here is a video and a few picks .https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tyiWzAl_n3g

title: Black Lake Camp (Hide & Seek)
briefDescription: Black Lake Camp is a new hide & seek map. The goal of the hider is to hide in the Black Lake Camp away from the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Black Lake Camp is a new hide & seek map. The goal of the hider is to hide in the Black Lake Camp away from the seeker. The seeker is released is 1 minute after the game starts. The seeker?s mission is to kill all the hiders, if you really want you can set your own timer and when that timer ends the players that are left over have won.
Screenshots:

There Are 7 Different Places To Hide:
1. Cave
2. Camp Site
3. Camp Fire
4. Toilet
5. Forest
6. House
7. Lake
This Is Where The Hiders Run Out Of:
In Between The Lake And Cave:
Camp Site:

title: Creative With Achievements On!
briefDescription: Have you ever wanted to get every achievement in Minecraft? But it would be to hard to do it in survival world would it? Well ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever wanted to get every achievement in Minecraft? But it would be to hard to do it in survival world would it? Well this world will give you creative and you will still earn achievements! There are helpful things included also! The things included are: set day, clear inventory, weather clear, and more!
Here Are The Things In The World!

title: Epic Survival House with Bunker
briefDescription: Do you want to do a survival but you don't want to build a house?Do you want a house to live with your friends?...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Do you want to do a survival but you don?t want to build a house?
Do you want a house to live with your friends?
Well, this might be the map you are looking for.
Includes bedrooms, jacuzzi, a pool, a path, a really big bunker and more.
Watch the trailer!
Note: the shaders used in the screenshot are Natural Mystic Shaders (download here). Shader pack not included with the world.
All the blue words are links, feel free to click them for more info.
This house might look small, but it has a huge bunker. Perfect for survival and multiplayer, have fun surviving Minecraft in this epic house. Built by the BrawlCraft Team: ZarMask Plus and FranProZ. The house has two floors.
In the first floor, there is a bedroom with two beds.
Also, there is a jacuzzi.
Outside, you can see a pool.
In the bunker there are potato crops and beetroot crops.
There is also a room full of chests and furnaces.

title: Devergs? Flat Worlds: Templates
briefDescription: Hello to Devergs' Flat Worlds: Templates. After installing the pack with world templates, you can create any of 18 unique worlds! Some worlds have their own ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hello to Devergs? Flat Worlds: Templates. After installing the pack with world templates, you can create any of 18 unique worlds! Some worlds have their own peculiarity, for example: the world of sponges can suck up all the water until the dry sponges run out. Also these are ordinary worlds like the bigger flat world. There are also worlds Redstone ready (V1-V3), ported from Java minecraft. Test everything yourself!
All worlds were made by Blocktopograph, you can download it below.

Bigger Flat World, Desert Flat World, Dirt Flat World, Leaves Flat World, Magma Flat World, Nether Flat World, Overworld Flat World, Packed Ice Flat World, Redstone ready (V1-V3), Snow Flat World, Sponge Flat World, Stone Flat World, Survival Flat World, Tnt Run Flat World (have error), Void Flat World, Water Flat World.
WARNING: DevergsMCBE didn?t mind that I would make a flat worlds version with a template function. See evidence.

This is an easy parkour map with easter eggs. In this map there are some really cool landscapes. With insane building as like the really nice rainbow. It was really hard to make. And this is my first Minecraft map I have made so I hope you enjoy. TIP, for the easter eggs you should look behind the door.
This image is at the start so this is the easy beginning part.

This is at the end where are some pretty difficult slime block jumps
But achievable.
This is at the rainbow part and the forest where there are a little bit challenging parts.

She?s back but in another world
And she?s challenging you to visit her cellar
Do you accept her challenge?
Well let see if you can play this map till end.
This map is based on the original game of SLENDRINA THE CELLAR created by DVloper
This is the first part of Slendrina (Cellar 1) where you need to find 8 old books to escape from Slendrina you also need to find keys to open several doors, look around as soon as you see Slendrina, Never look back
Slendrina the cellar is a slender like horror game
Originally from DVloper
This map is just the Cellar 1
If you expect cellar 1 to 3 I?m so sorry cause if I combined cellar 1, cellar 2, and cellar 3 the world will crash or maybe it won?t work properly
Cellar 2 and Cellar 3 is coming soon
Coming Soon Features:
How to play?
Rules!
For Better experience follow this settings:

This Map is not for multiplayer mode thrust me we already tested it, cause if you play it in multiplayer mode only one of you will be randomize to be chosen to collect books and keys for short only one of you can collect books and keys but Slendrina will also choose a player to be her victims and the another player can see Slendrina in his back so that player can warn the person that Slendrina is on his back so the game will no longer to be scary it will become funny but in next update I?ll try my best to make it able to play in multiplayer mode thank you for understanding but if you want to play with your friend(s) go ahead but now you know what you?ll expect
Watch my Trailer:

title: TSA ?Top Secret Authority?
briefDescription: Have you ever wanted a top-secret authority to share with your friends, then you have come to the right place. In the future, there will ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever wanted a top-secret authority to share with your friends, then you have come to the right place. In the future, there will be multiple bases, connected by secret underground tunnels,
which also lead to the wild. Currently, there is a boat attached to a dock, but I was so excited, so I wanted to get it out there! I am sorry for the short introduction, it will be longer in the future, this is my first map. I hope you like my map! ?
I guess all secret organizations need air transport, so the first kind of air transport I added was a helicopter. Here is an image.

This is the interior, it has glowstone lights, purpur stairs, which represent chairs,
and finally, a lever at the front. The lever does not do anything but it looks good.

title: TNT Run
briefDescription: Welcome to TNT Run! TNT Run is the epitome of Classic when it comes to Minecraft Minigames, and this map has got it all. Featuring ...
Description: This version of TNT Run is perfect for small groups of people. The Spawn and Arena are rather small, so the map is good for private servers, realms, playing with friends, and even singleplayer!

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to TNT Run! TNT Run is the epitome of Classic when it comes to Minecraft Minigames, and this map has got it all.
Featuring huge replayability (Ok, so it?s just a ?Reset? button), it?s equally perfect for a quick game and a long party! It has four layers of TNT, so each game goes rather quickly.
Includes:
Small hub/arena.
Spectator platform (With a comfy couch).

Reset Button for ultimate replayability.
Four layers of TNT blocks to run on.

title: Acrait Acres
briefDescription: This map focuses on the simpler pleasures of Minecraft: farming, fishing, and trading with friendly villagers. You spawn before a small cabin where you'll start ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map focuses on the simpler pleasures of Minecraft: farming, fishing, and trading with friendly villagers.
You spawn before a small cabin where you?ll start your farming journey.
Inspired by Stardew Valley!
Since the map focuses on farming, you will be given a few tools and seeds in the beginning to expand your farm. Visit the villagers and trade with them in a upgraded village!
The world offers you a home, a mine, a lake, a village, and a few hidden secrets.

crawledImageUrls.text: A world that contains all block states from all blocks in the game. Check out all the blocks which are in the game even the one that are secretly hidden ?

title: Forest Roam Manor
briefDescription: Forest Roam Manor is one of the biggest mansions on the block! It consists of 4 bedrooms in total including the master bedroom. It's a big ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Forest Roam Manor is one of the biggest mansions on the block! It consists of 4 bedrooms in total including the master bedroom. It?s a big open-space mansion with plenty of activities for your enjoyment. The mansion is surrounded by wood as it?s in the setting of a rural forest area. The mansion is the best and one of the most expensive mansions on the market as it sells for a minimum of $1,500,000.
Forest Roam Manor has over 10 rooms where you can have fun and enjoy your stay in a mansion that sells for over $1.5 million on the market!
This map initially included the ESBE shaders pack and the Flows HD texture pack to better your experience and gameplay! *But you would have to download them (link featured below) and apply them to the world yourself!*
Rooms
-Kitchen
-2 bathrooms
-Living Room
-Storage Room
-Craft Room
-Gaming Room
-Bolling Alley
-Master Bedroom
-3 guest bedrooms
-Foyer
While there may be a stacked and fulfilled interior for the benefit of your enjoyment in your Forest Roam Manor stay. There?s also a nice exterior and backyard.
Backyard
-Water Fountain
-Swimming Pool
-Small Garden
-Big Open Yard
-Mini Soccer Field
There?s much fun entertainment outside for all of your guests for any party you may have. You could choose threw all 5 of the entertainment activities in your own backyard. The backyard is also surrounded and fenced by many tall spruce trees.
The house design is a pretty standard wooden home. The house is made out of all sorts of wood and stones. The house is the shape of a rectangle with some round edges. The house consists of som skylights on top of the roof. Some windows are over the walls of the house, but the house is mostly private for its residents. The mansion is 1 floor, but the space inside the house is very big.
*Future Update- Possible basement: Movie Theater, Basketball court and etc!*
*Shout out to the ESBE shaders pack and the Flows HD texture Pack!*

title: Old Villager Template Worlds
briefDescription: Do you want to see the old villagers or use them in your own maps? These flat and infinite terrain worlds allow spawning the old ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Do you want to see the old villagers or use them in your own maps? These flat and infinite terrain worlds allow spawning the old villagers.
To get the correct spawn eggs for both v1 and v2 villagers, use the following commands:
? /give @s spawn_egg 64 15
? /give @s spawn_egg 64 115
? /give @s spawn_egg 64 44
I?m not sure if this one here (^^^^) is the correct zombie villager V1 spawn egg, sorry
? /give @s spawn_egg 64 116

title: Modern Estates
briefDescription: Modern Estates is a massive W.I.P. map that my sister and I have been developing for months. So far there are about 50+ houses, ...
Description: Modern Estates is a massive W.I.P city that has a multitude of attractions such as 50+ heavily detailed houses of all types, apartments, townhouses, city centers with lots of places to theoretically ?go shopping? at, rollercoasters, name-brand fast-food restaurants, cafes and restaurants, schools, and much more. It is important to know that this is NOT A COMPLETE WORLD so there is tons of room for my sister and me to improve and add on to it. We aren?t the most experienced builders so please give us patience while we improve on our building skills. Updates should come a couple of times a month if possible. Our Instagram accounts are L7kee (https://www.instagram.com/l7kee/) and Honeydoq (https://www.instagram.com/honeydoq/). We are constantly trying to improve on this world so please message any concerns to our Instagram accounts mentioned above.

crawledImageUrls.text: Modern Estates is a massive W.I.P. map that my sister and I have been developing for months. So far there are about 50+ houses, a couple of apartments and townhouses, two cities with city centers, several strip malls, a multitude of stores, rollercoasters, name-brand fast-food restaurants, theaters, and much more.
